mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.qid "qid", t.account "account", t.qItemID "qitemid", t.text "text" from t_questionnaireresult t where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_questionnaireresult t where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into t_questionnaireresult ( id ,qid ,account ,qItemID ,text ) values ( id ,#{qid} ,#{account} ,#{qItemID} ,#{text} )
mapper.update: update t_questionnaireresult set id=#{id} ,qid=#{qid} ,account=#{account} ,qItemID=#{qItemID} ,text=#{text} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.qid "qid", t.account "account", t.qItemID "qitemid", t.text "text" from t_questionnaireresult t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from questionnaireResult t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_questionnaireresult where 1=1 and id=#{id}
